Package src

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Database
  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

    Database is used to connect to the database and perform CRUD.

    It is used to store and get the information of the Users and Events.

    Author:
    Tam Thai Hoang 1370674, Huy Truong Quang 1370713 (get user list, check admin, get user, delete user), Sang Doan Tan 1370137 (update user profile, update event)

    • Method Detail

      • createConnection

        static java.sql.Connection createConnection()
        create database Connection to the Oracle database with the properties from the databaseProperties object.
        Returns:
        Connection to the database

      • closeConnection

        static boolean closeConnection()
        This method is used to close the Connection to the database.
        Returns:
        true if the Connection is closed successfully, false otherwise

      • getDatabaseProperties

        private static java.util.Properties getDatabaseProperties()
        Get the database properties from the properties file. The properties file is encrypted using jasypt
        Returns:
        Properties of the database

      • getJasyptPassword

        private static java.lang.String getJasyptPassword()
        Get the jasypt password from the file. A much better way to do this would be to use a web service, or from enviroment variable to get the password
        Returns:
        the jasypt password as a String

      • addUser

        public static boolean addUser​(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String hashPassword,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String phone)
        Add user to database and return true if the user is added successfully
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user
        hashPassword - hash(password+username) of the user
        name - full name of the user
        email - email of the user
        phone - phone number of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user is added successfully, false otherwise

      • existUsername

        static boolean existUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Check if username exists in database and return true if it does
        Parameters:
        username - username to check
        Returns:
        true if username exists in database , false otherwise

      • existUser

        static boolean existUser​(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)

        Check if the user exists in the database and return true if it does

        Using for LoginScreen to check if the user exists in the database

        Parameters:
        username - username of the user
        password - plain password of the user
        Returns:
        true if user is exist in the database, false if user is not exist in the database

      • existAdmin

        static boolean existAdmin​(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)

        Check if the user is admin or not

        Using for login purpose

        Parameters:
        username - username of the user
        password - plain password of the user
        Returns:
        true if user is admin, false if user is not admin

      • getUser

        static User getUser​(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Get the User object from the database
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the plain password of the user
        Returns:
        the user object from the database, or null if user does not exist

        Returns:
